snippet: Pablo Cuevas beat Spanish top seed Pablo Carreno Busta 6-3 7-6(2) on Saturday to set himself for a chance of a third consecutive Brasil Open title....

headline.main: Justin Thomas Makes an Ace and Takes Lead in Mexico
headline.print_headline: Justin Thomas Makes an Ace and Takes Lead in Mexico

lead_paragraph: Pablo Cuevas beat Spanish top seed Pablo Carreno Busta 6-3 7-6(2) on Saturday to set himself for a chance of a third consecutive Brasil Open title.
